entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
